title: [1.7.10][SSP/SMP]GoblinBob的MOD合集
txt_content:
本帖最后由 C似水流年 于 2015-5-30 21:19 编辑 

注意:本帖均搬运原帖最新版MOD。物理特性尸体MOD(RagdollCorpses)已更新至MC1.8使用，其他则为1.7，请有选择的下载~支持作者尽量点击[1.7.10]MoBends-0.20.1:Download      [1.7.10]animatedblocks-0.4v:Download [1.7.10]magiccubed-0.1v:Download [1.8]RagdollCorpses-0.12:Download
更多弯曲动作 MoBends[1.7.10]


[图片来自MODlogo]78的帖子:http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-307269-1-1.html更新记录Update #29 : about a month ago12/30/14-Bugfixes!Update #28 : about a month ago12/26/14-Fixed Bends Packs Loading!Update #27 : about a month ago12/25/14-Pack Managment bugfixes!-Hitbox & Username tag placement bugfix!Update #26 : about a month ago12/24/14-Customization Update!Update #25 : 3 months ago10/19/14-Added a 1.7.2 version of the newest build of the mod!-Bugfixes!Update #24 : 4 months ago9/20/14- Added the zombie animations,- Custom zombie hurt and death effectsUpdate #23 : 4 months ago9/19/14-Fixed the sword trails.Update #22 : 4 months ago9/19/14- Re-coded entirely.- Added a swimming animation.- Added a three combo sword attack animation.- Added a slick menu for customizing.Update #21 : 5 months ago8/11/14-Added Enderman animations.-Minor bugfixesUpdate #20 : 6 months ago7/22/14-Added scars over player's body which shows when the player's health is low.-Updated to 1.7.10.Update #19 : 6 months ago7/09/14-Fixed minor bugs.-Fixed the cut ankles and elbows.-Added a flying animation (WIP).-Fixed the sword swing animation.-The fist punching now applies while walking and running.-Applied every change to the Big Head preset.Update #18 : 7 months ago6/14/14-Fixed the spinning sprint jump bug.Update #17 : 7 months ago6/14/14-Added a new sprint jump animation, and changed the old one to falling animation.-Spider's model now applies to cave spiders as well.-Creepers now shake while exploding.-Creeper now moves it's body while walking.Update #16 : 7 months ago6/13/14-Changed creeper's proportions.-Added a possibility of disabling certain mob's animations.-Probably fixed the animation speed difference.-Tweaked the weapon swing animation.-Added a spider model.-Fixed the black enchanted armor bug.Update #15 : 8 months ago5/23/14-Added a 1.6.4 version of the mod.-Probably fixed the cape rendering.Update #14 : 9 months ago5/03/14-Probably fixed the incompatibility with Shaders.-Added Creeper animations (Work In Progress).-Added ZombiePigman's aggresive running and attack animations.Update #13 : 9 months ago5/01/14-Fixed the z"-fighting" of pixels that overlap eachother.-Probably fixed the animation speed.Update #12 : 9 months ago4/29/14- Adding Zombie animation presets.- Reduces the limb crack visibility.Update #11 : 9 months ago4/28/14-Updated to 1.7.2-Added new smooth animations-Added a new customization menu (default 'G' key)-Remade zombie animation & pigzombie animationUpdate #10 : about a year ago9/07/13-Updated to 1.6.2-Fixed multiplayer bug.Update #9 : about a year ago5/05/13-Updated to 1.5.2Update #8 : about a year ago4/24/13-Fixed small boots bug.-Fixed item hover above your hand when sitting on a pig.-Added bends for squid tentacles.-Added bends for all quadraped animals(pig,cow,sheep etc.)Update #7 : about a year ago3/22/13-Updated to 1.5.1Update #6 : about a year ago3/21/13-Fixed item movement bug.Update #5 : about a year ago3/20/13-Fixed skin bug.
MOD文件来自原帖，图片、更新记录均来自版主787878b的帖子
更多方块动画 animatedblocks[1.7.10]

[图片来自planetminecraft]简单介绍:非常有趣的小MOD，添加了门与活板门的开关动画，让它们看起来不再是那么的生硬[以上GIF均转自planetminecraft]作者在planetminecraft的原帖:http://www.planetminecraft.com/mod/animated-blocks/

魔立方 magiccubed[1.7.10]


[图片来自MODlogo]


[图片来自本人游戏实际测试]


本人的帖子:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=450755&page=1#pid8255805



有物理特性的尸体 RagdollCorpses[1.8]


[图片来自MODlogo]


[图片来自天蝎_心殇的帖子]
天蝎_心殇的帖子:http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-431874-1-1.html


如有需要，过后会把MOD详细介绍整理一下贴到这里。{:10_495:}

MOD合集下载地址:度盘

如果你喜欢作者的作品，请访问他的论坛[url=http://www.http://gobbob.net/]www.http://gobbob.net/[/url]查看更多内容

您的回复就是对我最大的支持！

replies.txt_content: 我的IE出问题了，作者论坛地址改了网页就崩，求哪位版主大大帮忙改改
